name: Till Death (internetgroundhogs)
description:
A serene farm lies before you, the crops wave in the wind as a shimmer of light follows in its wake. The farm is filled with cold steel - sharp and unyielding - forged from the ground itself. They stand strong as the fruit of your labour. With mighty tools of destruction in your hands, once again you venture into the wilderness in search of supplies.

Till Death is a hack n slash adventure game that pits you - the player - against mother nature. Venture into the unruly wilds, slay monsters and collect resources to grow your arsenal so that you might be able to reclaim that land you once called home.

As a lone survivor, you must make the most of what you have. By collecting seeds from various monsters, you can grow and cultivate your own weapons! Additionally, you can manipulate their outcome by nurturing them with various elemental fruits and fertilisers; making them more devastating!

Explore unique environments! Travel to forests once inhabited by humanity or the untamed wilds on the edge of the world. Till Death offers a large array of vistas to journey to, as well as replayable content that scales with each playthrough!

Do you have what it takes to survive? Take on mother nature in Till Death!
